name: Winman
body:
### WinMan This is the official site for WinMan (Code name). WinMan is a "window manager" for OS X that handles windows, apps and other things using Vim-like expressions. If you are used to and love Vim, then this is the ultimate tool to get rid of the mouse even outside of your text editor.

### Status The app is not released yet, but I hope to get feedback from my [demo video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yror1qNQQQE&list=UUdzFW98T6_g-LdJ0Yo8NdQQ). Leave your feedback in the [issue-tracker](https://github.com/sennah911/WinMan/issues). I will eventually release a beta, it may or may not be private, contact me on [twitter](https://twitter.com/hannesr) if you would like to get early access and help out finding the bugs. I haven't decided weather or not I will make this open source and rely on donations. ### Donations If you like the idea of WinMan, please consider donating a small amount of bitcoin and I will be forever grateful. Donations will help me: * Speed up the development process * Make a decision weather or not I can make it open source * Buy coffee BTC: 15ZZBwC49AgKNoE9o5rpe8t3a9JiCLwqAe
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
